CustomField.description: This field allows linking back to NetSuite by choosing one of the combined legacy Campaign IDs and providing a single value. For example, a "Campaign Internal Derived ID" = "1" will have "Campaign Legacy Combined NetSuite ID" = "6,7,8,9" and the "NetSuite Campaign ID" will be "6". All three custom Campaign ID-related fields, in theory, will have the same value for any campaigns created by post-migration. However, only the "NetSuite Campaign ID" field will be populated post-migration.
CustomField.label: Netsuite Campaign Internal ID
